text: The 1942 Oregon Webfoots football team represented the University of Oregon in the Pacific Coast Conference (PCC) during the 1942 college football season. In their first and only season under head coach John A. Warren, the Webfoots compiled a 2–6 record (2–5 against PCC opponents), finished in eighth place in the PCC, and were outscored by their opponents, 138 to 67. The team played its home games at Hayward Field in Eugene, Oregon. ==References== Oregon Category:Oregon Ducks football seasons Oregon Ducks football
title: 1942 Oregon Webfoots football team
